title: The Gray Days
description: In a world where imagination no longer exists, one boy embarks on a quest to rediscover its secrets. Seven year old James has heard all about the wonders of imagination. He's heard of the vast oceans, rivers, and mountains that were once imagined into existence. He's even learned about the mysterious music that made hearts smile...but none of that exists anymore. James lives in a gray world, where imagination is extinct. Determined to find imagination, James sets out on a courageous journey, armed with nothing but hope. Does he have what it takes to help the world leave The Gray Days behind forever?
author: Ariela Rossberg
